attributes.title: Dead Little Roosters - Official Trailer
attributes.caption: Promise of great fortune drew them together, but murder will tear them apart! Who will be the sole survivor on this night of trickery and deceit?
attributes.description: Promise of great fortune drew them together, but murder will tear them apart! Who will be the sole survivor on this night of trickery and deceit? The sleuthing starts January 8 on Rooster Teeth! Play along weekly to win your own great fortune. For more details, about the contest, prizes, and terms, visit DeadLittleRoosters.com.
attributes.display_title: S1:E0 - Dead Little Roosters - Official Trailer

attributes.title: Guest-Laid Plans
attributes.caption: Ten guests had arrived at the mansion, each lured by the promise of great fortune... but the night had ended in murder. And soon enough... the first guest would meet their maker.
attributes.description:
Ten guests had arrived at the mansion, each lured by the promise of great fortune... but the night had ended in murder. And soon enough... the first guest would meet their maker.

To participate in the interactive investigation, submit predictions and win fabulous prizes like a PS5, cast meet-and-greet & more, visit http://deadlittleroosters.com/

attributes.title: Suspicious Minds
attributes.caption: Secret pacts, subsistence woes and strained trust abound, and another guest is eliminated.

attributes.title: Ghosted
attributes.caption: As suspicions rise and new alliances unfold, several guests turn to the supernatural to sleuth out the murderer... With tragic results for one of the participants.

attributes.title: Amid a Murderer
attributes.caption: One guest's plan to unite the group quickly goes off the rails, while another learns that love transcends death... And yet another guest is cut down as the pool of suspects dwindles.

attributes.title: Deceived
attributes.caption: An outside consultant is brought in to help sift the truth from lies, as unexpected consequences result in the death of yet another guest.

attributes.title: No Love Lost
attributes.caption: Business deals and love triangles reach their boiling point as another guest meets an unfortunate demise.

attributes.title: Disillusion
attributes.caption: Mysterious plans are thrust into motion as the final four guests are whittled to three... But not everything is as it seems in this penultimate episode.

attributes.title: Truth & Consequence
attributes.caption: It's a shocking finale of lost fortunes and long-brewed vengeance, as the killer is finally revealed – but can the last survivor make it out alive?
